current_source_caen.description: The ideal current source for our work! (a little overpriced)
current_source_caen.name: CEAN Current Source FAST-PS-M 10006

current_source_tc.description: The Lakeshore 121 Current Source is used to measure the critical temperature (Tc) and performed critical current (Ic) measurements of heavily damaged tapes. In the future, it could also serve to produce the Hall current of a magnetic field sensor.
current_source_tc.name: LakeShore 121 Current Source

current_source_tdk.description: A decent current source provided by Andre Chouinard
current_source_tdk.name: TDK Current Source GEN6-100

multimeter.description: The digital multimeter is used to read the current off the shunt resistor.
multimeter.name: Keithley DMM6500 Digital Multimeter

nanovoltmeter.description: The nanovoltmeter (Keithley 2182A) provides high precision (<0.1 uV) measurements of the superconductor voltage.
nanovoltmeter.name: Keithley 2182A Nanovoltmeter

pressure_monitor.description: The pressure monitor (Instrutech Flexrax 4000) measures the pressure of the chamber with a capacitance (1e-4 to 1e3 torr) and an ionization gauge (1e-8 to 1e-4 torr). A third capacitance gauge, not displayed in the GUI, shows the backing pressure.
pressure_monitor.name: Instrutech FlexRax 4000 Vacuum Gauge Controller

temperature_controller.description: The temperature controller is used to set the temperature of the system using any of the 4 inputs (typically B). It also sends a control voltage to a Sorensen DCS150-7E Voltage source which feeds a proportional power to the embedded carthridge heaters.
temperature_controller.name: LakeShore 336 Temperature Controller

voltagesource.description: The voltage source is used to provide control voltage to the HP6260B Current Source. It can also be used to provide up to 6 A in steps of 0.001 A and above.
voltagesource.name: Keithley 2231-A-30-3 Power Supply
